title: Customized Learning Feedback Design Based on Educational Feedback Network Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Targets professionals interested in improving workplace efficiency through social network analysis. Focuses on developing smartphone-based learning content for PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can visualize learning interaction data as network graphs to analyze feedback flows.
Learners can predict meaningful feedback timing in individual learning patterns using an LSTM-based model.
Learners can design personalized feedback strategies based on analysis results tailored to learner characteristics.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
